version_description:
Mano the shaman has opened up the gates of another universe! The Island is now full of Stone Golems and Snatchins from Mystery Manor. But that’s not all: in an attempt to stop Christmas, Mano has also kidnapped Santa!

SAVE THE HOLIDAY:
• Banish all the Snatchins to Mystery Manor!
• Help the Elven Queen! Return power to the lady of Snow Woods and discover gateways to other worlds.
• Use new accessories! Unique holiday accessories will improve the stats of your buildings.
• Team up with other players for the holiday tournament—great rewards await you all.
• Make gifts! It’s a great way to get into the Christmas spirit.
• Unlock holiday achievements! Each one has a reward.
• Build the Elven Hotel! Find Santa Claus and get a five-star hotel and a unique statuette as prizes.

The New Year is coming! It’s a time to celebrate, party, and make plans for the future, but your tourists aren’t happy at all. Is Mano involved? Find out, and return the proper holiday spirit to your Island!

This New Year offers:
• Winter guests! The Winterbell Fairy, along with snowmen and penguins are already on their way. These guys will help you bring happiness back to the Island!
• New accessories! Adorn your buildings with magic watches, and their stats will improve!
• Holiday tournament! Team spirit, awesome prizes—just like you wanted!
• New Year gifts! Exchange them with other players, and bring back the holiday joy!
• Holiday achievements with great prizes! Unlocking them all will be a tough nut to crack.
• Holiday buildings! These beauties will surely create a holiday atmosphere in your resort, and make some profit.
• Lots of fun and surprises! Save the holiday before time runs out, and get an elite event statuette and a new hotel—the fantastic Ice Citadel!

The New Year is coming! It’s a time to celebrate, party, and make plans for the future, but your tourists aren’t happy at all. Is Mano involved? Find out, and return the proper holiday spirit to your Island!

This New Year offers:
• Winter guests! The Winterbell Fairy, along with snowmen and penguins are already on their way. These guys will help you bring happiness back to the Island!
• New accessories! Adorn your buildings with magic watches, and their stats will improve!
• Holiday tournament! Team spirit, awesome prizes—just like you wanted!
• New Year gifts! Exchange them with other players, and bring back the holiday joy!
• Holiday achievements with great prizes! Unlocking them all will be a tough nut to crack.
• Holiday buildings! These beauties will surely create a holiday atmosphere in your resort, and make some profit.
• Lots of fun and surprises! Save the holiday before time runs out, and get an elite event statuette and a new hotel—the fantastic Ice Citadel!

The holidays are gone, but the fun never stops on the Island. Are you ready for new challenges in Sandy Caps, that’ll lead you to great treasures? Then hoist the sails, climb aboard, and set out on a new adventure!

The journey offers:
• More new quests! They’re not easy to tackle, but it’s going to be a fun challenge.
• Checkpoints! You'll return to them when you lose!
• Mysterious achievements! You must be very attentive and witty to unlock them. We know you can do it!
• A new talisman! It’ll help you make things clearer, even on the hardest levels.
• A surreal hotel! The main prize of the journey is a unique building that Salvador Dali himself would be happy to spend a night in.

And that’s not all:

• Rhee the monkey is back! Your old friend is waiting for banana deserts and is ready to give you all sorts of presents in return.
• The Star Rating window is now even better! Use the arrows to see the stats of buildings with different ratings. Enjoy the new additions!

While Mano was agonizing over why roses are red and violets are blue, an unbelievably beautiful ship with pink sails appeared on the horizon. What is it doing here, you ask? “It’s the ship of my good friend Princess Amour,” says Naomi. Get ready to meet a REAL PRINCESS, as well as her Little Cupid friend, who is known for having perfect aim. Help them build the most amazing sea palace with the power of love!

THIS VALENTINE’S DAY:
• New quests and mysteries! Find out who Naomi’s anonymous admirer is.
• Beautiful ships with pink sails! They’ve arrived from the Land of Romance.
• Exciting Lucky Shells! A fun mini-game awaits you on the main ship.
• New achievements! Unlock them all and be rewarded.
• Loving hearts! Help your tourists give Chocolate Hearts to their loved ones.
* The amazing Citadel of Love! Build it with the power of true love.

AND THERE’S MORE:
• The Explorer’s Journal! Keep track of the Island’s history and its development in a special journal.
• New accessories! They’ll increase the effectiveness of your resort’s buildings. Don’t miss out!

* The amazing Citadel of Love! Build it with the power of true love.

AND THERE’S MORE:
• The Explorer’s Journal! Keep track of the Island’s history and its development in a special journal.
• New accessories! They’ll increase the effectiveness of your resort’s buildings. Don’t miss out!

Winter is almost over, but good old John Frost is starting one more season of Snowball Fights—and it’s an ANNIVERSARY one! Here we go!

NEW FEATURES IN SEASON TEN:
• Combos! Use the right weapons to land combos and get rewards.
• Candy instead of snowballs! Throw them at opponents, or eat them.
• Awesome chests! Get rewards for every 100 candies thrown.
• Profitable buildings! Exchange medals from fights for amazing new buildings.

AND THAT’S NOT ALL:
• New territory!
• Now a building's star rating will not decrease if you change it!
• The Snowflake Magnet now collects all the profits!

Hurray, spring is here! Everyone is in high spirits waiting for the holidays to come; it's good that St. Patrick's Day is just around the corner. Unfortunately, Mano the Shaman is back at it again with his shenanigans—this time he dared to steal the leprechaun's gold and created an army of evil golems! Okay, Mano, challenge accepted...

YOU'LL HAVE TO:

• Build and improve a scenic hill, which will serve as a portal to the Leprechaun Kingdom!
• Create an alliance with the Leprechaun King in the name of peace!
• Fight the stone army of Mano and earn prizes for your victories!
• Prove yourself in the tournament, fighting against the golems!
• Build magic wells that bring gifts!
• Unlock festive achievements to earn rewards!

AND THERE'S MORE:

• Go on a new journey to find treasure! Show us what you got in Sandy Caps, and take home a sea of gifts and an incredibly profitable accessory!
• New territories are available—explore them now!

Hooray, Easter is here! Are you excited for it? Sure you are, it’s a holiday that brings joy to everyone. Hold a fantastic celebration for the tourists on your Island, and get a whole basket of great gifts!

HERE’S WHAT TO EXPECT:
• Generous guests! Meet cute bunnies and the Easterson family—they’ve got some cool gifts for you!
• A new profitable building! Construct the Easter Diner, upgrade it, and turn it into a luxurious hotel.
• Easter accessories! These will help your power plants produce even more electricity.
• Holiday presents! Exchange spring gifts with your friends.
• The Easter tournament! Show everyone who’s the coolest egg in the basket, and win great rewards.
• Thanks to your feedback, the Leprechaun Hill now generates profits every 7 hours.

AND THAT'S NOT ALL:
• A new building for Champions’ Anchors, the Airship! You can find the aircraft of your dreams on the Exclusive tab of the game store.

The long-awaited update is here! Are you ready? It’s gonna get hot!

NEW BEACH BATTLES!
• Сombos in Beach Battles! Make combos to receive special prizes for the battle.
• New rewards for combos! Create your own battle tactics.
• Beach Tournament! Join other players and win a Golden Magnet, as well as other useful items.

ANIMALS IN DANGER!
• Save the bewitched animals! Mano the wicked shaman has trapped cute animals in horrible crystals.
• Enrich the Island habitats! Foil the shaman’s plans and let the saved animals roam the Island.

AND THAT’S NOT ALL!
• A new diary chapter! Learn more of the Island’s secrets and earn prizes.

• Сombos in Beach Battles! Make combos to receive special prizes for the battle.

AND THAT’S NOT ALL!

Cast off the lines! Raise the sails! The update is here!

FIRST EVER SEA ADVENTURE:
• Greet the Pirate Frigate and meet the enchanting Captain Emilia onboard!
• Help Mano the Shaman charm Emilia!
• Build the magnificent Cruise Yacht and take part in the race for pirate treasures!
• Take part in the event tournament and win great rewards!
• Send and receive awesome gifts!
• Help the ship’s crew return home safely and get a new accessory as a reward!

NEW SEASON OF BEACH BATTLES:
• Complete new quests and get luxurious rewards!
• Take part in a tournament and win prizes!
• Exchange Sunshine Medals for a chest full of special stamps, and build an amazing hotel on the water!

AND THERE’S MORE:
• New chapter in the Journal. Unlock a new page of the Island’s history and get a reward!
• Landscape changes: the small stream near Jay’s tent is now a rapid river!

Hooray, the update is here! We’ve prepared a ton of surprises!

FIRST EVER SCIENTIFIC BOOM!
• Find out the secret behind the strange Pile of Parts and learn about the technology of the new millennium!
• Help the scientists solve another mystery and get extremely useful items as rewards.
• Take part in a scientific tournament and win awesome prizes.
• Send and receive space gifts!

SAVE THE PANTHER
• Mano the Shaman has imprisoned a black panther in a crystal. Foil his plans!
• Set the panther free so it can roam the Island with its friends.

AND THAT’S NOT ALL
• Weekly Best Union rankings! Gain points, get to the top, and all the union members will get sweet rewards!
• A new chapter in the Journal! Learn more about the Island and get a prize!
• New items! Grasper 42 can remove one accessory from a building absolutely free, while the Chip Set and the Fuel Can give you enough energy for Sandy Caps and Speedboat mini-games.

A shuttle has crashed on the Island! Its passengers are not your regular green aliens, but proud and brave Space Cats! Celebrate Independence Day with them, and help the adorable kitties get back to their home planet.

THIS HOLIDAY:
• Interact with Space Cats!
• Build new event buildings and play Lucky Purr Boxes!
• Unlock achievements and get rewards!
• Get accessories as gifts!
• Take part in the holiday tournament and win prizes!
• Build an amazing Puss Shuttle on the Island!

FIRST EVER ENDLESS JOURNEY
• Play Sandy Caps all across the archipelago and get rewards!
• Complete the journey as many times as you can, and win prizes every time!

The long-awaited update is here! New mysteries, new quests, and battles for glory and rewards!

DAILY QUESTS
• Get ready for a new type of quests—daily! Complete various tasks to get prizes and achievement points in return.
• Complete time-based quests! Just wait until a reward becomes available, and claim it before the timer runs out.
• Please note: daily quests will replace timed quests from tourists as well as daily achievements.

BEACH BATTLES, SEASON XVIII
• Prepare for the updated Beach Battles PRO! Rob Malibu got all your feedback and made the quests in season XVIII a little easier.
• Daily rewards! Now, you can get them for winning union battles.

NEW RUINS
• Investigate two new mysterious objects in the mountains. You will learn all the secrets of these mysterious ruins soon enough!

The long-awaited update is here! New mysteries, new quests, and battles for glory and rewards!

DAILY QUESTS
* Get ready for a new type of quests—daily! Complete various tasks to get prizes and achievement points in return.
* Complete time-based quests! Just wait until a reward becomes available, and claim it before the timer runs out.
* Please note: daily quests will replace timed quests from tourists as well as daily achievements.

BEACH BATTLES, SEASON XVIII
* Prepare for the updated Beach Battles PRO! Rob Malibu got all your feedback and made the quests in season XVIII a little easier.
* Daily rewards! Now, you can get them for winning union battles.

NEW RUINS
* Investigate two new mysterious objects in the mountains. You will learn all the secrets of these mysterious ruins soon enough!

10.4.2
Fixed a bunch of issues from the previous version - thanks for reporting them to us!
The long-awaited update is here! New mysteries, new quests, and battles for glory and rewards!

10.4.1
DAILY QUESTS
* Get ready for a new type of quests—daily! Complete various tasks to get prizes and achievement points in return.
* Complete time-based quests! Just wait until a reward becomes available, and claim it before the timer runs out.
* Please note: daily quests will replace timed quests from tourists as well as daily achievements.

BEACH BATTLES, SEASON XVIII
* Prepare for the updated Beach Battles PRO! Rob Malibu got all your feedback and made the quests in season XVIII a little easier.
* Daily rewards! Now, you can get them for winning union battles.

NEW RUINS
* Investigate two new mysterious objects in the mountains. You will learn all the secrets of these mysterious ruins soon enough!

Update! Remember all the scientists who visited the Island? They’re back for another Scientific Boom!

SCIENTIFIC BOOM: SEASON II
• Meet scientists and inventors! Help them and you’ll get chests full of useful items.
• Exchange great gifts with your friends! Science is fun!
• Storm into the scientific tournament! Team up with other island owners, and fight for some amazing rewards.
• Get special accessories! They’ll reduce your buildings’ staff requirements.
• Build and upgrade the Eureka Hotel! Special stamps that you’ll need for this drop from various places all throughout the event.
• Take part in special competitions! Great prizes await you.
• Get the most generous reward—the Innovator's Chest! Complete all the quests in time to get your hands on it.

AND THAT’S NOT ALL:
• The daily quests have been updated! Now, you can get more achievement points, star coins and even some crystals!

Update! Put on your party hats and bring your plates for some cake—the festivities begin!

THE ISLAND'S BIRTHDAY 2018:
• Hold a party on the Island! Complete event quests and help Naomi with the preparations.
• Greet the guests! Give them your attention to receive gifts.
• Build the Paradise Island Museum! Your tourists will surely enjoy the events in it.
• Assemble the Book of Wisdom page by page! This accessory will generate unbelievable profits for you.
• Unlock new achievements! Generous rewards already await you.
• Dominate the holiday tournament! Team up with other players in the fight for sweet prizes.
• Exchange gifts with friends! They will surely appreciate the magnificent Mister Pebbles statue.
• Take part in special competitions! Amazing prizes await all contenders.

AND THAT’S NOT ALL:
The Island is now even prettier! We’ve updated the images and animations of plants on your resort. You’re going to love it!

Hot update! Who’s that waving to you on the beach? Rob Malibu, that’s who! Load your guns with water, grab some towels, and let the Battle begin!

BEACH BATTLES, SEASON 19:
• New quests in Battles PRO: now it’s even more interesting to play, and easier to win!
• New achievements! Complete them to gain prizes and glory.
• More daily bonuses! Win Battles with your union and get generous rewards.
• Battle Tournament! Combine your efforts with other players and fight for amazing prizes.

AND THAT’S NOT ALL:
Enjoy the sights of your Island! Now you can zoom in on different objects and see them life-sized.

Get ready for an update! We’ve greatly improved the FAQ section!

NOW YOU CAN:
• Quickly find the answers you need by searching
• Stay in the know about popular articles with the Hot Topic section
• Easily write tickets to the support team and get notifications about their answers

AND THAT’S NOT ALL:
• We’ve reworked many of the FAQ articles and made it more informative
• Simply open the News tab and press the Support button to check out the new FAQ

The cold breath of spirits, heavy zombie footsteps, demonic laughter. Is it a horror movie plot? Nope, Halloween is coming to the Island!

SPOOKY HOLIDAY:
• Protect the Island from evil forces
• Construct mysterious buildings
• Take part in the holiday tournament with great rewards
• Get magic accessories as gifts
• Unlock achievements and send gifts

AND MORE:
• Rhee is back! The monkey is waiting for treats and is ready to reward your generosity with prizes!

Easter update! Very soon the main spring holiday will come to the Island!

• Generous guests! Meet the cute bunnies and the gift-bearing Winterbell Fairy
• A new profitable building! Build the beautiful Spring Yard for more unique events
• Easter accessories! They will tune up your power stations to produce even more
• Holiday gifts! Exchange spring items with your friends
• The Easter tournament! Show everyone who’s the egg-boss around here and win great prizes

Massive update! You’ve never seen anything like this!

MATCH-THREE MINI-GAME:
• Explore the turtle-shaped island near the shores of your resort and unlock the Turtilliada mini-game!
• Match pieces, complete levels, and receive prizes!
• Get to the very end, meet Willy the Octopus, and open his chests!
• Unlock the Turtilliada achievements and win prizes!

NEW YEAR – COMING SOON:
• Prevent the Old Year from staying on the Island!
• Fight the Ghosts of past months and win rewards!
• Save the New Year by fixing the Clock of Eternity!
• Receive accessories as gifts or craft them at the Workshop!
• Dominate the holiday tournament and earn prizes!
• Unlock achievements and send themed gifts!

Gobble-gobble! Thanksgiving Day is coming to your Island! Join the party!

A GENEROUS HOLIDAY:
• Help Naomi prepare a festive dinner and save Mano from the turkeys!
• Play Lucky Baskets and win holiday resources and useful items!
• Take part in the festive tournament to get awesome prizes!
• Get accessories as gifts and build a five-star hotel!
• Complete daily quests and earn great rewards!

Get ready for the greenest update!

ST. PATRICK’S DAY — SOON:
• Meet the Leprechauns — Dorin’s red brothers! They love gold, but are also generous.
• Organize a party on the Island!
• Build 2 new hotels with fun events!
• Get profitable accessories!
• Don’t miss the tournament and its amazing rewards!
• Send thematic gifts to your friends!

SEASON XXI OF BEACH BATTLES — MUST PLAY:
• Quests for new players and PRO quests for veterans!
• A chance to win the Warrior's Chest with amazing rewards!
• A Beach Tournament for the bravest islanders!

IMPORTANT NOTE:
• Going through the Turtilliada stages once more now costs energy — be careful. Have fun!

Massive update! Craft unique items in the new Workshop!

For the first time in the game:
• A new hero on the Island! Meet Dorin Gingerbeard, the Dwarf
• A huge chameleon is guarding the mountain! Chase him away to let Dorin begin his work
• The Dwarven Workshop will astonish you! The only thing left to do is repair it
• Craft useful accessories! Make wonders with your own hands
• Craft unique items and chests! These will come in handy for Island development

The update is here! Get ready for cool content!

THE TURTILLIADA MINI-GAME:
• 10 new levels!
• Now you can see the rewards for locked levels!
• Changed the number of daily tries for some stages!

Gobble-gobble! Thanksgiving Day is coming to your Island! Join the party!

A GENEROUS HOLIDAY:
• Help Naomi prepare a festive dinner and save Mano from the turkeys!
• Play Lucky Baskets and win holiday resources and useful items!
• Take part in the festive tournament to get awesome prizes!
• Get accessories as gifts and build a five-star hotel!
• Complete daily quests and earn great rewards!

Friends, the update is here! Get ready for tons of new content!

SCIENTIFIC BOOM: SEASON III
• Very soon scientists will visit your island. Help them and receive chests full of useful items!
• Exchange cool gifts with your friends. Science is fun!
• Dominate the Scientific Tournament! Challenge other players to win neat rewards!
• Get special accessories! They’ll decrease your buildings’ staff requirements!
• Get the ultimate reward – the Innovator's Chest!

SNOWBALL FIGHTS: SEASON XI
• Very soon John Frost will start a new Snowball Fight! Join the party!
• Complete quests and get prizes!
• Unlock achievements with generous rewards!
• Play Snowball Fights PRO, they’re amazing!
• Take part in the tournament and be the best!

AND THERE’S MORE:
• The price for accessory slots has been decreased in several buildings!
• Now some decorations can be improved with accessories!

10.11.0
• Major technical improvements.

10.10.0

Christmas is coming to the Island!

FUN HOLIDAY:
• Mano the Shaman took down Santa’s sleigh and turned the reindeer into Snatchins! Only you can save Christmas!
• Build holiday buildings and get holiday profits!
• Receive accessories as rewards or craft them in the Workshop!
• Dominate the holiday tournament with amazing rewards!
• Unlock achievements and send holiday gifts!
• Help Santa build a flying train!

AND THERE’S MORE:
• New daily quests! Craft items in the Workshop!

10.12.1
• Game stability improvements.

10.12.0
Christmas is coming to the Island!
FUN HOLIDAY:
• Mano the Shaman took down Santa’s sleigh and turned the reindeer into Snatchins! Only you can save Christmas!
• Build holiday buildings and get holiday profits!
• Receive accessories as rewards or craft them in the Workshop!
• Dominate the holiday tournament with amazing rewards!
• Unlock achievements and send holiday gifts!
• Help Santa build a flying train!

AND THERE’S MORE:
• New daily quests! Craft items in the Workshop!

Massive update! You’ve never seen anything like this!

MATCH-THREE MINI-GAME:
• Explore the turtle-shaped island near the shores of your resort and unlock the Turtilliada mini-game!
• Match pieces, complete levels, and receive prizes!
• Get to the very end, meet Willy the Octopus, and open his chests!
• Unlock the Turtilliada achievements and win prizes!

NEW YEAR – COMING SOON:
• Prevent the Old Year from staying on the Island!
• Fight the Ghosts of past months and win rewards!
• Save the New Year by fixing the Clock of Eternity!
• Receive accessories as gifts or craft them at the Workshop!
• Dominate the holiday tournament and earn prizes!
• Unlock achievements and send themed gifts!

Get ready for a fiery update!

THE CHINESE NEW YEAR IS COMING:
• Meet the wise man Lao Dao and his apprentice! They haven’t come empty-handed.
• Place the Coffer of Harmony in your resort and receive gifts during the entire holiday event!
• Organize the festivities and build a Chinese-themed hotel!
• Craft profitable dragon-shaped accessories at the Workshop!
• Fight in the holiday tournament and win great prizes!
• Unlock achievements and exchange great gifts with your friends!

THE FIRST EVER EXTENDED HOLIDAY:
• Organize an Elite Party together with Dorin and Naomi to celebrate the Chinese New Year. Complete all the quests and get another hotel as a reward!

AND THAT’S NOT ALL:
• A new territory is available! Unlock it and explore it!

The update is here! Get ready for cool content!

THE TURTILLIADA MINI-GAME:
• 10 new levels!
• Now you can see the rewards for locked levels!
• Changed the number of daily tries for some stages!

11.2.1
• Game stability improvements.

11.2.0
The update is here! Get ready for cool content!
THE TURTILLIADA MINI-GAME:
• 10 new levels!
• Now you can see the rewards for locked levels!
• Changed the number of daily tries for some stages!

Attention everyone! Listen up, and don’t say you missed this message. A princess has escaped from the Land of Romance! Some say she’s lost all faith in love and decided to hide on Paradise Island with her cupids. Talk her into coming back home and get the Goodies Factory as a reward!

VALENTINE’S DAY — SOON:
• The pink ship with a runaway princess onboard is approaching the Island!
• Help the princess regain her faith in love with the help of sweets!
• Unlock achievements and exchange gifts with friends!
• Craft great accessories in the Workshop!
• Fight in a tournament for prizes!
• Complete the event and get the five-star Goodies Factory!

The long-expected update is already here!
• Rhee the monkey is back! Your old friend is waiting for banana deserts and is ready to give you all sorts of presents in return.
• Various graphical and technical improvements.

Get ready for the greenest update!

ST. PATRICK’S DAY — SOON:
• Meet the Leprechauns — Dorin’s red brothers! They love gold, but are also generous.
• Organize a party on the Island!
• Build 2 new hotels with fun events!
• Get profitable accessories!
• Don’t miss the tournament and its amazing rewards!
• Send thematic gifts to your friends!

SEASON XXI OF BEACH BATTLES — MUST PLAY:
• Quests for new players and PRO quests for veterans!
• A chance to win the Warrior's Chest with amazing rewards!
• A Beach Tournament for the bravest islanders!

IMPORTANT NOTE:
• Going through the Turtilliada stages once more now costs energy — be careful. Have fun!

Hooray, the update is here! The SCIENTIFIC BOOM will start on your Island very soon!

SCIENTIFIC BOOM: SEASON IV
• Help the scientists and get chests full of useful items!
• Exchange gifts with your friends. Science is fun!
• Dominate the scientific tournament! Compete with other players for amazing rewards.
• Get special accessories! They will reduce your buildings’ staff requirements.
• Claim the main prize of the event – the Innovator's Chest!

Hooray, the update is here! The SCIENTIFIC BOOM will start on your Island very soon!

11.6.1
• Game stability improvements.

Easter update! Very soon the main spring holiday will come to the Island!

• Generous guests! Meet the cute bunnies and the gift-bearing Winterbell Fairy
• A new profitable building! Build the beautiful Spring Yard for more unique events
• Easter accessories! They will tune up your power stations to produce even more
• Holiday gifts! Exchange spring items with your friends
• The Easter tournament! Show everyone who’s the egg-boss around here and win great prizes

Hooray, the update is here!

SEA ADVENTURE – NEW SEASON!
• Meet Capt. Emilia and her team!
• Build the amazing Pirate Frigate!
• Join the festive tournament with awesome prizes!
• Complete quests to get useful accessories!
• Help the pirates hold a party and get a chest full of treasure as a reward!

AND THERE’S MORE:
• 50 new Turtilliada levels! Exciting objectives, various quests, and neat rewards!
• New season of Rhee the Monkey. Soon!

It’s a festive update: space cats are coming to visit and celebrate Independence Day!

HOLIDAY ACTIVITIES:
• Interact with the space cats!
• Construct Puss Buildings and play Lucky Purr Boxes!
• Unlock achievements and get rewards!
• Receive accessories as presents!
• Take part in the holiday tournament and win prizes!
• Build the amazing Spacecraft on your Island!

AND THERE’S MORE!
• New season of Beach Battles is coming soon! Charge you water guns!

Hurray, the update is already here! It will be a hot time!

SPECIALLY FOR YOU:

• 5 new levels! Develop your Island, gain experience and reach new heights!
• New buildings in our store! A glorious Business Center and a mysterious oriental Cafe are here for you.
• New gifts! Your friends are sure to like these.
• A new territory is now available! Don’t miss this opportunity to enlarge your Island.

BEACH BATTLES, NEW SEASON:

• Load your water guns and join the battle with other players!
• Complete quests and receive gorgeous rewards.
• Take part in the Beach Tournament and win great prizes!
• Get your timing right, fulfill all the objectives and get a chest full of stamps to build a luxurious hotel!

SCIENTIFIC BOOM, NEW SEASON:

• Help the scientists and gain chests with useful items!
• Exchange gifts with your friends. Science is fun!
• Rush into the Scientific Tournament! Fight for the best rewards together with other players.
• Get special accessories! These will reduce staff requirements for your buildings.
• Get the main prize, the Innovator's Chest!

Hot Update!
SEA ADVENTURE - NEW SEASON:
• Meet Capt. Emilia and her team! They’re already on the Island.
• Build the Pirate Frigate – it’ll attract tons of tourists!
• Get the new useful accessory – the Pirate Tricorn!
• Reach the top of the tournament ratings and claim generous rewards!

THE SEARCH FOR TREASURE:
• Play Sandy Caps on the islands and get awesome prizes!
• Endless game: receive prizes every time you finish the game!

Festive update! Let’s celebrate the Islands birthday together!

AT THE CELEBRATION:
• Treat your guests with a sweet cake and receive gifts!
• Fight for cool rewards at the festive tournament.
• Build a stunning Air Castle, with amazing events.
• Get a useful accessory as a reward and use it to develop your Island.

NEW SCIENTIFIC BOOM SEASON:
• Help the scientists and get chests full of useful items.
• Make your friends familiar with science — send them gifts.
• Climb to the top of the tournament, and gain awesome rewards!
• Get the main prize, the Innovator's Chest!

RHEE THE MONKEY, THE GUEST OF YOUR ISLAND:
• Feed the monkey with juicy treats: she will give you valuable gifts as a sign of her gratitude.
• Rhee’s quests are simpler now — be sure to treat your guest!

Long-awaited Update!

IMPORTANT CHANGES:
- Progress saves more often! The "last save" is downloaded every time you go online
- Before switching to a different device, make sure to go online and save your progress

THANKSGIVING:
- Take in guests and receive gifts
- Construct holiday buildings
- Get a useful accessory as a reward
- Rush to the tournament for cool rewards

The update is here!

HOT FEATURES:
• Building is easier than ever! The game instantly suggests the perfect spot.
• Better matchmaking for feeding Rhee! Play with worthy allies for maximum output.

YOU SPOT ‘EM – WE FIX ‘EM:
• Resolved the issue with choosing a location in Facebook Gameroom.
• Fixed some technical problems.

Welcome the holiday update!

CHRISTMAS IS HERE:
• Keep the cold penguins warm!
• Hold a wonderful fair with the elves!
• Complete tasks and get accessories!
• Join the tournament with cool prizes!

NEW YEAR IS CLOSE:
• Banish the ghosts of the past months!
• Fix the clock in the Park of Time and save Eternity!
• Complete achievements and earn gifts!
• Win a useful accessory!

Poof! The update is here!

SEA ADVENTURE — SEASON VI:
• Greet Captain Emilia and her crew with a loud “yo-ho-ho!”
• Complete quests and participate in the tournament. The Pirate Brig is on the line!

IN SEARCH OF TREASURES:
• Play Sandy Caps on the islands and get rewards.

This juicy update will suit every taste!

SPORTING FESTIVAL 2020:
• Meet the athletes with a loud “Hip, hip! Hurray!”
• Join the tournament, collect stamps and build a fun skate park!

BEACH BATTLES — NEW SEASON:
• Prepare a water gun and hurry to the battle for rewards!

• Help scientists, complete quests and earn gifts!

The update is here!

SHIP AHOY!
• Pass the lines! Meet Captain Emilia and her team.
• All hands on deck! Take part in a tournament and get your prizes.
• Build the Pirate Frigate and hoist the sails!
• Hold a pirate party so big that the deck creaks! You’ll get a treasure chest as a reward.

GUESS WHO IS HUNGRY!
• Rhee the Monkey is back on the Island!
• Feed her generously, and she’ll pay you back handsomely!

Updates!

VOYAGE FOR TREASURES:

UFO ON THE ISLAND:
Communicate with the aliens and build an incredible Spring Yard!

SCIENTIFIC BOOM IS BACK:
Help the scientists to get an Innovator's Chest!

BONUS!
Complete Turtilliada levels at the first attempt to get Emerald Turtles. They can be exchanged for a Flamingo Dingy and an Anchor decoration.

MINI-GAME
Guess numbers in clan chat to receive valuable prizes!

• Captain Emilia is here once again!

HAPPY HALLOWEEN:
- The most mystical holiday is returning to us
- Ghosts, a blogger and a professor are already on the Island! What’s do they have in common? Soon you’ll find out!
- Build a Ghost Residence and upgrade it to a luxurious hotel.

- Play Sandy Caps on the Islands and get rewards for each new completed level!

- Help the scientists, complete quests and get your main prize, the Innovator's Chest!

Update time!

THANKSGIVING:
- Meet top farmers and take a look at their crops!
- Present your guests with Grain Bags and receive gifts!
- Hurry and build a luxurious villa. And maybe something else too!

BEACH BATTLES – NEW SEASON:
- Fill your guns with water – soak the enemy!
- Show your skills and climb to the top of the ratings!

SHE’S BACK:
- A familiar ship is on the horizon – meet Cpt. Emilia!
- Complete Sea Adventure quests and get the Pirate Brig!

It’s Update Time!

YOUR FAVORITE WINTER HOLIDAYS ARE CLOSE:
- Christmas and New Year are coming soon! Create a magical holiday atmosphere on the Island and gain valuable prizes.

THE NEW SNOWBALL FIGHT SEASON:
- Make snowballs and fight for rewards!

RHEE THE MONKEY IS HUNGRY AGAIN:
- Feed her, and she will return more than your fair share of kindness.

- Identical buildings can now be stored in the same Warehouse slot!

Juicy update with tons of content to suit every taste!

VALENTINE’S DAY:
- Have you heard the legend of two dragons? Greet your guests, they’ll tell you the whole story!
- Light and darkness need to unite and make a whole. Help the dragons in love meet each other!

LUNAR NEW YEAR:
- The elements have broken the noble captain’s boat. Find out who’s to blame!
- Repair the broken boat, and the energy of the moon will reward you!

FUN ACTIVITIES:
- New Snowball Fights season: get your snowball throwers ready, because it’s gonna be hot!
- New treasure hunt — the archipelago islands await you!

New content!

SPRING IN FULL SWING:
- Visit the spring fair and fill your Island with flowers!
- Take care of your furry guests and miracles will start happening!

FUN SCIENCE:
- Don’t miss the new Scientific Boom season! Expect great discoveries and amazing rewards.

FOR YOUR CONVINIENCE:
- You can now use several items of the same type simultaneously!

Something new!

EARTH DAY ON THE ISLAND:
- An experienced professor, together with volunteers, will come to the Island to take care of its ecology!
- Protect nature by building a modern, self-sustaining home!

FAVORITE HEROES ARE BACK:
- Monkey Rhee is here again, and she's hungry!
- What's that on the horizon? That's Captain Emilia's ship!
- The scientists brought the Innovator's Chest back to the Island!

Juicy Update!

SPACE VISITORS:
- A ship from planet Caturn is entering Earth’s atmosphere!
- Take part in the adventure and win awesome gifts.

HONEY ADVENTURE:
- Complete new union quests and get a ton of sweet prizes. They’re good for you!

BEACH BATTLES:
- Ready your water slingshots and pistols! The tournament is starting soon.

SCIENTIFIC BOOM:
- Unlock achievements and get prizes! Leave the books to the bookworms.

FOR YOUR CONVENIENCE:
- Holding events is now easier than ever!

Mega Update!

SPORTS FESTIVAL:
- Warm-up, stretch, and trade event resources with your guests.
- Build a Sports Arena on the Island and set new records!

MOVIE TIME:
- Famous movie stars are coming to spread some culture among islanders.
- Build a state-of-the-art movie theater and shoot a movie featuring Mano.

THE RETURN OF THE LEGENDS:
- Cpt. Emilia’s team is heading to your shores in full sail.
- Rhee the monkey is hungry once again. Get ready for a guest visit!
